label: Performance in Grad Thesis II
description: Performance laboratory involving the rehearsal and performance of student works under faculty supervision performed in MFA Thesis concert. .5 to 3 undergraduate hours. .5 to 3 graduate hours. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: .5 to 3 undergraduate hours. .5 to 3 graduate hours. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Dance or Dance major(s).
classScheduleInformation: Non-dance majors admitted by audition on a space-available basis.
